snippet: An agreement to shrink America’s military presence could reduce local tensions.
abstract: Editorial praises Japanese Prime Min Shinzo Abe for agreeing on timetable with United States to reduce size of American military presence on Okinawa; holds power base in Japan is necessary for regional stability, especially in light of North Korean aggression, but that long-deferred concerns of Okinawans must be addressed.
lead_paragraph: An agreement to shrink America’s military presence could reduce local tensions.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
